content.rendered:
Awards & Prizes

Junior Division

FIRST PRIZE: $3,000
Sponsored by: Yamaha Canada

SECOND PRIZE: $2,000
Sponsored by: The Consulate General of the Republic of Poland in Toronto

THIRD PRIZE: $1,000
Sponsored by: The Royal Conservatory

Senior Division

FIRST PRIZE: $10,000
Airfare and accommodation to compete in the Preliminary Round
of the 16th International F. Chopin Competition
A series of concerts in Canada and the USA
Sponsored by: The Marie Curie Sklodowska Association

SECOND PRIZE: $7,500
Airfare and accommodation to compete in the Preliminary Round
of the 16th International F. Chopin Competition
Sponsored by: The W. Reymont Foundation

THIRD PRIZE: $5,000
Airfare and accommodation to compete in the Preliminary Round
of the 16th International F. Chopin Competition
Sponsored by: The Maximilian Kolbe Foundation

PRIZE FOR BEST POLONAISE PERFORMANCE $500
Sponsored by: Ed Uba & Family

PRIZE FOR BEST MAZURKA PERFORMANCE $500
Sponsored by: Karl Fujarczuk

Chopin […]
